about_the_game:
Experience online gaming like never before! LAN Party is designed to be the perfect compliment to your gaming group. Whether you're playing the latest FPS cooperatively, competing against each other in an RTS, or playing different games entirely, LAN Party makes communicating and sharing gameplay so much easier. Fully customize your unique gaming room, avatar, and gaming setup, and invite your friends to hang out and play games or have a watch party in your virtual space. Create, customize, connect – welcome to the next era of online gaming, where the excitement, energy, and camaraderie of a LAN party meets the freedom of the virtual world.

Stream Gameplay

Experience the excitement of the game together through seamless in-room gameplay streaming. Open your friend's gameplay stream to cheer them on and broadcast your stream to a virtual screen so you can all watch together.

Watch Content With Friends

Use a shared video screen and have a watch party with your friends. Our streaming infrastructure ensures that videos are always synced between viewers.

Have Full Control Over Your Avatar

Express yourself exactly as you want with full control over your avatar. Find the perfect avatar on our marketplace or easily bring in your own design. We give you the freedom to fully customize all aspects of your avatar including its scale, animations, and emotes.

Create A Unique Gaming Environment

Fully customize your unique gaming environment. We encourage creativity by allowing you to choose your room layout, lighting, furniture, and much more. Make your virtual space as unique as the gamers who visit it.

Marketplace

Our in-app marketplace allows our community to share its creations. Easily download avatars, furniture, decor, and other items to design your perfect space, or upload your creations to share with others.

name: LAN Party

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: i5-3570K 3.4 GHz 4 Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required. SSD is not required.

short_description: Experience in-person gaming, online! LAN Party is designed to be the perfect compliment to your gaming group. Whether you're playing the same game competitively, cooperatively, or playing different games entirely, LAN Party makes communicating and sharing gameplay so much easier.
